dmca.title: Guardians Try to Protect "The Winds of Truth"
dmca.body:
[Private],
	[Private],
	Kurow, 8951
	South Island,
	New Zealand
Email Add: [Private]

To Google,inc. 
Attn: Customer Support, Image Search Service Complaints. 
To whom it may concern Re Copyright Infringment,

We the Guardians of The Winds Of Truth on behalf off the Trustees of the Group of Solar Teaching, are very concerned about a chap [Private], who is trying to take over the writings of the Winds Of Truth. He was told by the trustees in Glastonbury They wanted absolutely nothing to do with him.

He then went ahead and put the Winds Of Truth on Yahoo, he changed text and added His own material. This is total abuse off our copyright for the Winds Of Truth.

The trustees then put a case forward to Yahoo And they removed the infringing sites, we are now aware he has them back on again and also on Google. The Trustees want this material involving all Winds of Truth books removed from all his sites. We hope for your help in this matter, and any information that would help us keep him from using The Winds of Truth illegally.We are also getting in touch with Yahoo over this repeated copyright infringement.

[Private], Email [Private] this is his Email address for your
information.

Yours Sincerely,
 [Private]

[Private]

[Private]

2

Copyright Information
dmca.principal_name: The Guardians of the Winds of Truth
